item.title: Rcpp: Using C++ to improve performance in R
item.description: Rcpp is an R library allowing for easy integration of C++ code in your R workflow. It allows you to create optimized functions for when R just isnâ€™t fast enough. It can also be used as a bridge between R and C++ giving you the ability to access the existing C++ libraries. Continue reading to learn how you can use Rcpp in your projects! Read full post
